program.title: Program information
program.description: Information required to run the program

binary.title: Program binary
binary.description: The entry point for an executable

args.title: Program arguments
args.description: The arguments to provide to an executable

env.title: Environment variables
env.description: Environment variables to provide to an executable

lifecycle.title: Lifecycle events
lifecycle.description: Lifecycle events which a program is interested in. The default is 'ignore', meaning a the component will not be notified of the event.

stop_event.title: Stop event
stop_event.description: The stop event will occur before a component is terminated

use.title: Used capabilities
use.description: Capabilities that will be installed in this component's namespace

service.title: Used service source path
service.description: The path under which a service is offered to this component

protocol.title: Used legacy service source path
protocol.description: A path, or a list of paths, under which a legacy service is offered to this component

directory.title: Used directory source path
directory.description: The path under which a directory is offered to this component

storage.title: Used storage capability
storage.description: The type of storage which has been offered to this component

runner.title: Used runner name
runner.description: The name of a runner offered to this component

event.title: Used event name
event.description: The name of an event or a list of event names

event_stream.title: Event stream
event_stream.description: The static event stream upon which to receive events

from.title: Used capability source
from.description: The component which is offering the capability to use. Either "realm" (default) or "framework"". May not be specified for runners, because the source is implicitly "realm" in that case.

as.title: Used capability target path
as.description: The path to which the capability will be installed in the component's incoming namespace. Defaults to "service"/"directory". May not be specified for runners.

rights.title: Used directory capability rights
rights.description: The set of capability rights which are required by this component for this use statement.

subdir.title: Used directory subdirectory
subdir.description: An optional relative subdirectory to use instead of the root

dependency.title: The type of dependency that this offer represents
dependency.description: A component which receives a weak offer must support the offered capability being unavailable at any point. Defaults to "strong". Can only be used on protocols and directories

filter.title: Used event filters
filter.description: A component defines the path of the capability it'll get through an event. Can only be used on capability_ready events.

path.title: The path(s) of the capability in a component
path.description: A path that the component requests on capability ready

expose.title: Capabilities exposed
expose.description: Capabilities exposed by this component to its containing realm

service.title: Exposed service source path
service.description: The path to the service being exposed. This is either a path in this component's outgoing namespace (if from "self"), or the path by which the service was exposed by the child (if from "#$CHILD").

protocol.title: Exposed legacy service source path
protocol.description: A path, or a list of paths, to legacy service being exposed. Each path must be from this component's outgoing namespace (if from "self"), or must be a protocol path exposed to this component by a child (if from "#$CHILD").

directory.title: Exposed directory source path
directory.description: The path to the directory being exposed. This is either a path in this component's outgoing namespace (if from "self"), or the path by which the directory was exposed by the child (if from "#$CHILD").

runner.title: Exposed runner source name
runner.description: The name of the runner being exposed. This is either a runner provided by the componenet (if from "self"), or the name of a runner exposed by a child (if from "#$CHILD").

resolver.title: Exposed resolver source name
resolver.description: The name of the resolver being exposed. This is either a resolver provided by the componenet (if from "self"), or the name of a resolver exposed by a child (if from "#$CHILD").

from.title: Exposed capability source component
from.description: The component which has the capability to expose.

as.title: Exposed capability target path or name
as.description: The path or name by which the capability will be exposed. Defaults to the source path/name.

to.title: Exposed capability target type
to.description: The sort of destination that may receive the exposed capability. Either "realm" or "framework". Defaults to: "realm"

rights.title: Exposed directory capability rights
rights.description: The set of capability rights which exposed by this component to the destination

subdir.title: Exposed directory subdirectory
subdir.description: An optional relative subdirectory to expose instead of the root

offer.title: Offered capabilities
offer.description: Capabilities offered by this component to its children

service.title: Offered service source path
service.description: The path to the service being offered. This is either a path in this component's namespace (if from "self"), or the path by which the service was exposed or offered from another component (if from "realm" or "#$CHILD").

protocol.title: Offered legacy service source path
protocol.description: A path, or a list of paths, to legacy services offered to children. Each path must either come from this component's namespace (if from "self"), or must be a path which was exposed or offered from another component (if from "realm" or "#$CHILD").

directory.title: Offered directory source path
directory.description: The path to the directory being offered. This is either a path in this component's outgoing namespace (if from "self"), or the path by which the directory was exposed or offered from another component (if from "realm" or "#$CHILD").

storage.title: Offered storage type
storage.description: The storage type being offered. Must be one of "data", "cache", or "meta".

runner.title: Offered runner name
runner.description: The runner being offered. This is either a runner declared by this component (if from "self"), or a runner which was exposed or offered from another component (if from "realm" or "#$CHILD").

resolver.title: Offered resolver source name
resolver.description: The name of the resolver being offered. This is either a resolver provided by the componenet (if from "self"), or the name of a resolver offered from another component (if from "realm" or "#$CHILD").

event.title: Offered event name
event.description: The name of an event or a list of event names

from.title: Offered capability source component
from.description: The component which has the capability to offer. For services, directories, and runners one of "framework", "realm", "self" or "#$CHILD"; for storage either "realm" or "#$STORAGE_SECTION_NAME".

to.title: Offered capability targets
to.description: The components the capability is being offered to

as.title: Offered capability target path or name
as.description: The path or name by which the capability will be offered. Must be omitted for storage capabilities.

rights.title: Offered directory capability rights
rights.description: The set of capability rights which offered by this component to the destination

subdir.title: Offered directory subdirectory
subdir.description: An optional relative subdirectory to offer instead of the root

filter.title: Offered event filters
filter.description: A component defines the path of the capability it offers through an event. Can only be used on capability_ready events.

path.title: The path(s) of the capability in a component
path.description: A path that the component requests on capability ready

storage.title: Storage capabilities
storage.description: Declared storage capabilities backed by a directories from which data, cache, or meta storage can be offered.

from.title: Offered directory capability source component
from.description: The component which has the directory capability to use for storage. Either "realm", "self" or "#$CHILD".

name.title: Storage name
name.description: The component's local name for this storage

path.title: Offered directory capability source path
path.description: The path of the directory capability. The path is either a path into the component's outgoing directory (if from "self"), or the path by which the capability was exposed or offered from another component (if from "realm" or "#$CHILD").

environments.title: Environments
environments.description: An Environment defines properties which affect the behavior of components within a realm, such as its resolver.

name.title: Environment name
name.description: The environment's name. This name is used to reference the environment assigned to the component's children.

extend.title: Environment's initial state
extend.description: Whether the environment state should extend its realm, or start with empty property set. Optional (by default, empty)

__stop_timeout_ms.title: Stop timeout for a component
__stop_timeout_ms.description: The duration in milliseconds that component manager will wait before telling the runner to kill the component.

runners.title: The runners registered with this environment
runners.description: The runners that are available from this environment

runner.title: Runner source name
runner.description: The name of the runner capability as it's exposed or offered to or defined by this component.

from.title: Runner source component
from.description: The component which offers, exposes, or defines this runner capability.

as.title: Runner target name
as.description: The name by which the runner will be made available in the environment. Defaults to "runner".

resolvers.title: The resolvers registered with this environment
resolvers.description: The resolvers that will handle component URL resolution for components with this environment.

scheme.title: URL scheme
scheme.description: The URL scheme this resolver handles

resolver.title: Resolver name
resolver.description: The name of the resolver to use. The resolver must be offered to this realm.

from.title: The resolver source component
from.description: The component which offers, exposes, or defines this resolver capability.

children.title: Child components
children.description: The children of this component, including name and launch information

name.title: Child component name
name.description: The parent's local name for the child

url.title: Child component URI
url.description: The URI that identifies the child component.

startup.title: Startup mode
startup.description: Conditions that trigger the component to start (defaults to "lazy")

environment.title: Assigned environment
environment.description: The environment assigned to the child.

name.title: Collection name
name.description: The parent's local name for the collection

durability.title: Durability
durability.description: The durability of components in the collection. Either "persistent" (instances in the collection exist until the parent is destroyed) or "transient" (instances in the collection exist until the parent is stopped)

environment.title: Assigned environment
environment.description: The environment assigned to instances in this collection.

from.title: Runner source component
from.description: The component providing the underlying runner protocol. Either "realm", "self" or "#$CHILD".

path.title: The path of the capability
path.description: The path of the capability providing the runner service. The path is either a path into the component's outgoing directory (if from "self"), or the path by which the capability was exposed or offered from another component (if from "realm" or "#$CHILD").

path.title: The path of the resolver protocol
path.description: The path in the component's outgoing directory providing the resolver protocol.
